duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess and administer in-store vaccines and boosters.
Engage customers and patients by greeting them and offering assistance with products and services.
Resolve customer issues in a timely manner and answer questions to ensure a positive customer experience.
Model and share customer service best practices with all team members to deliver a distinctive and delightful customer experience, including interpersonal habits.
Support efforts on enhancing customer experience by increasing focus on healthcare services.
